entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is being kept by Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He is mentioned as someone whose happiness is essential to their plans.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the people keeping Griphook. He is mentioned in a conversation with Hermione about leaving soon.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people keeping Griphook. She is mentioned in a conversation with Ron about leaving soon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the people keeping Griphook. He is mentioned as someone who has to deal with Griphook's unhappiness.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a character who enters the scene along with Dean. She is talking about some creatures that she and Dean have found.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a character who enters the scene along with Luna. He is carrying driftwood and looks uncomfortable when he passes Harry.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as someone whose expression Harry's companion has at one point.

relationships.description: Griphook is being kept by Ron, along with Hermione and Harry. This is mentioned in the text as something that Griphook's happiness depends on.
